duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and drive high priority network initiatives and projects in cloud and hybrid cloud models.
Evaluate network infrastructure and connectivity solutions and make recommendations for cloud-based migration of applications and data workloads.
Collaborate with leadership, business partners, vendors, and project teams for cloud network initiatives.
Provide technical expertise and mentoring for high-visibility cloud solutions, implementations, and migration initiatives.
Participate in network assessment, design, connectivity, and ongoing operation for connecting to various cloud vendors.
Assist with the migration of existing applications to new cloud hosting platforms.
Provide senior-level network engineering, design, and operation consultation with leadership, project teams, and end users.
Participate in potential refactoring, rebuild, or redesign during cloud migration.
Create documentation, requirements documents, logical and physical network diagrams, and implementation plans for cloud network integration.
Serve as a senior network resource in the hybrid cloud enterprise journey encompassing ongoing cloud architecture, design, planning, and configuration.
Responsible for engineering, implementing, and operating cloud network solutions at the component level, including troubleshooting and optimization.
Provide feedback to leadership and peers on risks identified during business impact analysis, site risk assessments, and disaster recovery planning.
Maintain technical knowledge and business acumen within the discipline or function.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Networking (Master's preferred)
Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) certification acceptable with other network credentials
